title: Regular Show Season 1-4 Complete + Specials (BluRay - WEB-DL) [m
description:
I spent a weeks worth finding good BluRay's and WEB-DL's for this torrent, which are hard to get because of the little to none seed count. The video quality is signifigantly higher than the others. So please seed with all your might, and let's hope this doesn't become a dead torrent!!! -[mR12]



Regular Show Season 1-4 Complete + Specials (BluRay - WEB-DL) [mR12]

Regular Show is an American animated television series created by J. G. Quintel for Cartoon Network. The series revolves around the lives of two friends, a Blue Jay named Mordecai and a raccoon named Rigby, both employed as groundskeepers at a park. Their usual attempts to slack off often lead to surreal misadventures that are either over the top or supernatural. The show's tagline, "It's anything but", alludes to this. The series is produced by Cartoon Network Studios. Although the series does not air on Cartoon Network's Adult Swim block and is rated TV-PG, it is considered more of an adult animated sitcom rather than a children's cartoon. It is also aged 12 on CSM.
